org.descripter.js.ss

Class Executable

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.descripter.js.ss.Executable

  • public class Executable
extends java.lang.Object

    Manages descripted and compiled executables for the server-side scriptlet and pages.

    Since:
    Descripter 1.0
    Author:
    J.J.Liu (Jianjun Liu) at http://www.descripter.org

    • Field Summary

      The class of the executable.
      protected long stamp
      The time-stamp of the executable.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public java.lang.Object execute(Scriptlet<?> s)
                         throws java.io.IOException

        Executes this executable in a given Scriptlet.

        Parameters:
        s - A Scriptlet for executing this executable
        Returns:
        The return result of the execution
        Throws:
        IOExeption - if an IOException happens when executing
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        Descripter 1.0

      • updated

        public boolean updated(java.io.File file)

        Determines if an update for the current executable from the specified File is unnecessary.

        Parameters:
        file - A File
        Returns:
        true if an update is unnecessary; false, otherwise.
        Since:
        Descripter 1.0

      • get

        public static final Executable get(Scriptlet<?> scriptlet,
             java.io.File file,
             boolean jssp)
                            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                   java.lang.ClassNotFoundException

        Statically gets or creates an executable.

        Parameters:
        scriptlet - A Scriptlet to compile and/or descript the source file
        file - A File of Server-Side JavaScript source or JavaScript Server Page
        jssp - true if the source file is a JavaScript Server Page; otherwise, it is Server-Side JavaScript source.
        Returns:
        The existing or newly created executable.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Since:
        Descripter 1.0
